content.body: jmdyck: i'd take the approach that simply having the internal slots of X makes you X
devsnek: *slots* specifically, or slots + methods?
slots and methods
that‚Äôs a very different thing
‚ÄúHas the slots‚Äù is the brand check; ‚Äúhas the methods‚Äù is ‚Äúinherits from the expected prototype chain‚Äù. Exotic objects are exotic unrelated to their prototype.
ljharb: the mop methods
i generally think of mop methods as slots themselves, which is why i didn't specify
oh. i don‚Äôt have as much of an opinion about that since the existence of mop methods isn‚Äôt user-observable, but it makes sense that the spec would require both
(devsnek said "internal slots" originally. I was taking "internal" as given when I said "slots + methods".)
I can't believe I got so thoroughly nerd-sniped into spending 1.5 hours fixing this mess.
